ants

Class AntGameReplayData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ants.AntGameReplayData

  • public class AntGameReplayData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the evolution of the state of an ant game. It can be exported as JSON and then used in the AIVisualizer to replay the game.
    Author:
    Nicolas
    See Also:
    Documentation/protocol/replayformat.html

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The list of bot ants tracks.

      The squared radius of the attack mask.

      The ending bonus points for each bot.

      The name of the cut-off rule that ended the game.

      The list of food units tracks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AntGameReplayData

        public AntGameReplayData(AntMapTemplate mapTemplate,
                         float viewRadius2,
                         float attackRadius2,
                         int maxRound,
                         int loadTimeMs,
                         int responseTimeMs)
        Creates a new game replay object.
        Parameters:
        mapTemplate - the map template used in the game.
        viewRadius2 - the squared radius of the view mask.
        attackRadius2 - the squared radius of the attack mask.
        maxRound - the maximum round count for this game.
        loadTimeMs - the load time of the game in milliseconds.
        responseTimeMs - the response time for one round in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Documentation/protocol/replayformat.html

    • Method Detail

      • toJSONObject

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSONObject()
                                 throws org.json.JSONException
        Generates the replay of an ant game as a JSON object.
        Returns:
        a JSON object containing replay data for this game.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if replay data cannot be accessed.

        public void addHiveHistoryRecord(int botId,
                                 int hive)
        Adds a hive amount in the hive history track of the bot identified botId in the game.
        Parameters:
        botId - the game identifier of the bot to add the hive record.
        hive - the hive record to add to the track.

        Sets the bonus points of the bot identified botId in the game.
        Parameters:

        bonus - the bonus points amount.

        Parameters:
        winninTurn - the last gaming round.
